com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.econ

Interface EconomyAPI.EconomyUpdateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConditionManager, LocalResourcesSubmarketPlugin, LuddicPathBaseIntel, PirateBaseIntel, ShipQuality
    Enclosing interface:
    EconomyAPI

    public static interface EconomyAPI.EconomyUpdateListener
    Called whenever economy data is recalculated, i.e. both when time passes and when the player opens the trade screen etc. Needs to be added via EconomyAPI.addUpdateListener(); should not be added to SectorAPI.getListenerManager(). Copyright 2018 Fractal Softworks, LLC
